text: The `.roo/rules` file is very long. Let me add a section about fleet coordination to the existing `AGENTS.md` in the workspace rules more concisely:

We coordinate everything in .ruler. and in nested .ruler/AGENTS.md. we should REALLY start putting that back together so we STOP getting these massive files and let our justfile command for ruler apply --nested do what it is meant to do
You're right - let me check the `.ruler` structure and add fleet coordination there properly:
The `.ruler/` directory doesn't exist yet! Let me create the proper structure:
Hmmm well at SOME point you had PROPER organization for multi agent I can't begin to tell you shat happened to it
Let me search git history to find what happened to the `.ruler/` structure:
Found it! PR #193 migrated `.ruler/` to the wiki. Let me check what's in the wiki now:
Found the old structure! Let me restore it:
